posts.post_content:
Difficult Obak Ten Million for sale.
There is a light horizontal wrinkle that doesn't break the paper on the front but you can see it on the back.
beautiful example.
$700.00 delivered insured PayPal OK.
Email address is [url]RBCraik@aol.com[/url]
Thanks for looking!

posts.post_title: Bump for one lower price then off to National
posts.post_content:
Bump for lower price...If not sold here, I will have this card and a few more in Cleveland if any board members want to inspect further. It really is one of the nicer specimens I have seen.
Thanks!
